typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> TCrossReference
TCrossReference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID == 106.0 && TARGET_CODE != 'PI') ~> FilterCodetypeIDandTargetCode
FilterCodetypeIDandTargetCode aggregate(groupBy(TARGET_CODE),
	TARGET_DESCRIPTION = first(TARGET_DESCRIPTION)) ~> AggregateTargetCode
AggregateTargetCode derive(TOP_KEY = 'ALL',
		TOP_DESCRIPTION = 'All Business Areas',
		GRP_KEY = case(TARGET_CODE =='EN' || TARGET_CODE =='BU', 'EG', case( TARGET_CODE =='PM' || TARGET_CODE =='PF', 'PI', TARGET_CODE)),
		GRP_DESCRIPTION = case(TARGET_CODE =='EN' || TARGET_CODE =='BU', 'Energy+', case( TARGET_CODE =='PM' || TARGET_CODE =='PF', 'P&I', TARGET_CODE)),
		BUA_KEY = case( TARGET_CODE =='PM' || TARGET_CODE =='PF', 'PI', TARGET_CODE),
		BUA_DESCRIPTION = case( TARGET_CODE =='PM' || TARGET_CODE =='PF', 'P&I', TARGET_CODE)) ~> DeriveTopGrpBus
DeriveTopGrpBus derive(each(match(!startsWith(name,'TOP')), $$ = '')) ~> DeriveTopLevel
DeriveTopLevel aggregate(groupBy(TOP_KEY),
	each(match(name!='TOP_KEY'), $$ = first($$))) ~> AggregateTopLevel
DeriveTopGrpBus derive(each(match(!startsWith(name,'TOP')&&!startsWith(name,'GRP')), $$ = '')) ~> DeriveGrpLevel
DeriveGrpLevel aggregate(groupBy(GRP_KEY),
	each(match(name!='GRP_KEY'), $$ = first($$))) ~> AggregateGrpLevel
DeriveTopGrpBus derive(each(match(!startsWith(name,'TOP')&&!startsWith(name,'GRP')&&!startsWith(name,'BUA')), $$ = '')) ~> DeriveBuaLevel
DeriveBuaLevel aggregate(groupBy(BUA_KEY),
	each(match(name!='BUA_KEY'), $$ = first($$))) ~> AggregateBuaLevel
AggregateTopLevel, AggregateGrpLevel union(byName: true)~> UnionTopAndGrp
UnionTopAndGrp, AggregateBuaLevel union(byName: true)~> UnionGrpAndBua
DeriveTopGrpBus select(mapColumn(
		TARGET_CODE2 = TARGET_CODE,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION2 = TARGET_DESCRIPTION,
		BUA_KEY2 = BUA_KEY,
		BUA_DESCRIPTION2 = BUA_DESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAll
